short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A few simple keyboard shortcuts for closing tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension that adds a few simple keyboard shortcuts for closing tabs. Tabs are closed relevant to the currently opened tab. The extension ships with default commands which can be configured in settings.

Preferred Keybindings
Close all tabs except current tab: Ctrl+Shift+Up
Close all tabs including current tab: Ctrl+Shift+Down
Close all tabs left of current tab: Ctrl+Shift+Left
Close all tabs right of current tab: Ctrl+Shift+Right
